content:
As an FYI. I'll be giving a presentation about writing Rust in VS Code where rust-analyzer will obviously be featured very prominently. Let me know if there's any type of messaging that y'all want me to get across to any potential new users. https://twitter.com/code/status/1485334280381345796

:crab: This Thursday, our livestream is all about RUST! We'll talk with @ryan_levick about getting started coding with @rustlang in VS Code. ðŸ—“ Add to calendar :point_right: https://aka.ms/code-livestream-page https://twitter.com/code/status/1485334280381345796/photo/1

- Visual Studio Code (@code)
